mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Boards ( userId, title, content, image_urls, createdDate, updatedDate ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrls}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardId, b.userId, b.title, b.content, b.image_urls AS imageUrls, b.comment_count AS commentCount, b.like_count AS likeCount, b.createdDate, b.updatedDate, u.username FROM Boards b JOIN Users u ON b.userId = u.userId ORDER BY b.boardId DESC

SELECT b.boardId, b.userId, b.title, b.content, b.image_urls AS imageUrls, b.comment_count AS commentCount, b.like_count AS likeCount, b.createdDate, b.updatedDate, u.username FROM Boards b JOIN Users u ON b.userId = u.userId WHERE b.boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Boards SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_urls = #{imageUrls}, updatedDate = NOW() WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
